## CardsReader.enumerateCards() method

Lists all inserted cards.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
enumerateCards(): Promise<Card[]>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<Card[]>`

a promise to return a list of card information for connected cards.
